control.name: 7.3 - Develop and use policies and procedures for restricting access to cardholder data
control.desc: Personnel need to be aware of and following security policies and operational procedures to ensure that access is controlled and based on need-to-know and least privilege, on a continuous basis.

test.steps:
7.3 Examine documentation and interview personnel to verify that security policies and operational procedures for restricting access to cardholder data are:

- Documented,

- In use, and

- Known to all affected parties.
